item.title: Samsung Chromebook Plus Demo at CES 2017
item.description: This video is a quick hands on the Samsung Chromebook Plus by Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed at CES 2017.

item.title: Acer Chromebook 15 C910-54M1 Review
item.description: A quick review by Robby Payne of the Acer Chromebook 15 C910-54M1, which is powered by an Intel core i5 processor.

item.title: Chomebook Pixel vs Macbook Pro - 2015 Models Compared
item.description: This video by Waj Syed from MW Technology compares the Chromebook Pixel 2 with the latest version of the MacBook Pro.

item.title: Unboxing and Review of the Chromebook Pixel 2 LS
item.description: This video by DetroitBORG gives you some good impressions of the new Chromebook Pixel LS from unboxing to naming the hardware components, comparing it with the predecessor, and demonstrating the software.

item.title: Acer Chromebook 15 C910-C37P Unboxing
item.description: This is a short video of Robby Payne unboxing one of the latest Chromebooks out there, the Acer Chromebook 15 C910-C37P.

item.title: Steam In-Home Streaming Demoed on a Toshiba Chromebook 2
item.description: This video demonstrates game play on a Toshiba Chromebook 2 running Xubuntu via Crouton using the Steam In-Home Streaming technology.

item.title: Acer Chromebook 15 Introduced at CES 2015
item.description: Acer showcased this new Chromebook at CES 2015, which currently takes place in Las Vegas: the Acer Chromebook 15.

item.title: Hands-on the Tegra K1 powered HP Chromebook 14 at IFA 2014
item.description: A short hands-on video of the upcoming Tegra K1 powered HP Chromebook 14 recored by Steve Paine at IFA 2014.

item.title: Hands-on the Toshiba Chromebook 2 at IFA 2014
item.description: There are 2 main criticisms of Chromebooks in terms of hardware: too little RAM and low quality displays. An upcoming Chromebook that could fill this gap is the Toshiba Chromebook 2 CB30-B.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook C300 Unboxing and Hands-On
item.description: In this video Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed gets his hands on the new 13.3-inch ASUS C300 Chromebook.
